name: A Death in the Family
effect:
As an additional cost to play A Death in the Family, pay 5 endurance. KO target stunned character. Lose X endurance, where X is the cost of that character.
“When Jason died, he took Robin with him. And no matter how much anybody may want it – you can’t bring back the dead.”

name: Airborne Assault
effect:
Characters you control have flight this turn. Characters you control get +1 ATK while attacking this turn.
“To the air!”

name: Alfred Pennyworth, Faithful Friend
effect:
Alfred Pennyworth comes into play exhausted. Activate, return Alfred Pennyworth to owner’s hand -> Search your deck for a plot twist or equipment card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck. Use this power only if you control another Gotham Knights character.
Let me get that for you, Master Bruce.”

name: Arkham Asylum
effect: Activate -> Return target stunned Arkham Inmates character you control to owner's hand. Activate -> Target Arkham Inmates attacker gets +2 ATK this turn while attacking an exhausted defender.

name: Assassin Initiate, Army
effect:
Pay 1 resource point -> KO target character with a cost of 1. Use this power only once per turn.
“The Demon's Head decrees your life at an end.”

name: Azrael, Jean Paul Valley
effect:
Loyalty. Whenever Azrael stuns a defender with reinforcement, KO that defender. Boost 1: When Azrael comes into play, he gets + 2 ATK and +2 DEF, has flight, and has range this turn.
“We do not have to be who others make us.”

name: Bane, The Man Who Broke the Bat
effect:
Loyalty. Whenever Bane attacks, you may KO target stunned character. Boost 1: When Bane comes into play, he gets +2 ATK and +2 DEF this turn.
His tremendous physical strength and rage are amplified by the gene-altering drug Venom.

name: Bane, Ubu
effect:
At the start of the recovery phase, you may KO target stunned character. Boost 2: When Bane comes into play, he gets +1 ATK and +1 DEF this turn for each location you control.
“Only the word of my master keeps me from destroying you.”

name: Barbara Gordon as Oracle, Information Network
effect:
As an additional cost to recruit Barbara Gordon, reveal another Gotham Knights character card from your hand. Pay 1 resource point -> Draw a card. Use this power only once per turn. Activate -> Draw a card. Use this power only during the recovery phase.
Once Batgirl, Barbara Gordon became Oracle after being paralyzed by a gunshot wound from the Joker.

name: Bart Allen as Kid Flash, Speedster
effect:
Exhaust a Teen Titans Character >> Ready Bart Allen. Activate, target Teen Titans Character has reinforcement this turn
No more messing around. No more kid stuff. No more Impulse.”

name: Bat-Signal
effect:
As an additional cost to play Bat-Signal, exhaust a Gotham Knights character you control.

Search your deck for a Gotham Knights character card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.

“He'll be here.”

“He'll be here.”

name: Batarang
effect: Transferable. Equip only to a Gotham Knights character. Equipped character has range and “Activate, KO Batarang -> Exhaust target character with a cost less than this character's cost. Use this power only during the combat phase.”

name: Batcave
effect:
Flip Batcave only if you control a Gotham Knights character.

At the start of the build phase, you may have target opponent gain control of the initiative. If you do, at the start of the combat phase, the player who started the turn with the initiative gains control of the initiative.

At the start of the build phase, you may have target opponent gain control of the initiative. If you do, at the start of the combat phase, the player who started the turn with the initiative gains control of the initiative.

name: Batman, Caped Crusader
effect:
Whenever Batman stuns a defender, that defender’s controller loses endurance equal to that defender’s recruit cost. (This is in addition to the normal stun endurance loss.)
Out of the grips of violence, justice is born.

name: Batman, The Dark Knight
effect:
Loyalty. Batman gets +X ATK and +X DEF, where X is the number of cards in your hand. Exhaust a Gotham Knights character you control -> Draw a card.
“Tell all your friends. Tell them they’re finished. Tell them the streets belong to the Batman.”

name: Batman, The World's Greatest Detective
effect:
As an additional cost to recruit Batman, reveal another Gotham Knights character card from your hand. Activate -> KO target ongoing plot twist. Its controller puts the top card of his deck into his resource row. Use this power only during the recovery phase.
“The world only makes sense when you force it to.”

name: Batmobile
effect: Equip only to a Gotham Knights character. Equipped character gets +1 ATK and +1 DEF. If equipped character would become stunned while defending, you may KO Batmobile instead. If you do, the character is not stunned.

name: Batplane
effect:
Gotham Knights characters you control have flight.

KO Batplane >>> Return target character you control to owner's hand.

"There's not a sensor system built that can detect us."

  • Collector Number: DOR-025
  • Rarity: U
  • Card Type: Equipment
  • Recruit or Threshold Cost: 0
  • Artist: Billy Dallas Patton & Kris Justice
KO Batplane >>> Return target character you control to owner's hand.
"There's not a sensor system built that can detect us."

name: Beast Boy, Garfield Logan
effect:
Whenever Beast Boy attacks or is attacked, put a +1 ATK /+1 DEF counter on him.
"Lions and tigers and t-rexes… oh my!"

name: Black Mask, Roman Sionis
effect:
Discard a character card with no team affiliation from your hand -> Power-up Black Mask. Use this power only while Black Mask is attacking or defending. (A powered-up character gets +1 ATK and +1 DEF this attack.)
His mask is carved from his father's ebony coffin.

name: Blackfire, Komand'r
effect:
Activate, pay 5 endurance -> Stun target front row character. Use this power only during your attack step.
“Beg for mercy, and perhaps I shall grant it.”

name: Blackgate Prison
effect:
Activate, stun an Arkham Inmates character you control -> Draw a card.
“Arkham gets the loonies. We get your everyday super-criminals.”

name: Break You
effect:
As an additional cost to play Break You, discard up to three cards from your hand.

Target attacker or defender gets +2 ATK this attack for each card you discarded this way.

“Batman is no more. I have destroyed him. I rule these streets. I rule Gotham.”

  • Collector Number: DOR-144
  • Rarity: C
  • Card Type: Plot Twist

  • Artist: Kevin Maguire
Target attacker or defender gets +2 ATK this attack for each card you discarded this way.
“Batman is no more. I have destroyed him. I rule these streets. I rule Gotham.”

name: Brother Blood, Leader of the Church of Blood
effect:
Whenever Brother Blood stuns a character, KO that character unless its controller discards two cards from his hand. Boost 1: When Brother Blood comes into play, KO any number of characters you control. Brother Blood gets +2 ATK this turn for each character you KO'd this way.
“Mine is a destiny carried down through the ages. You cannot stop the Church of Blood!”

name: Cassandra Cain as Batgirl, Martial Artist
effect:
Loyalty. Discard a Gotham Knights character card from your hand -> Cassandra Cain gets +1 ATK and +1 DEF this attack.
Cassandra’s father never taught her to speak, instead training her as a silent assassin.

name: Cassie Sandsmark as Wonder Girl, Zeus's Chosen
effect:
Cassie Sandsmark cannot be stunned by a character with a cost of 6 or more. (While Cassie Sandsmark is defending, apply breakthrough as normal.)
"The bigger they are, the harder they fall."

name: Catwoman, Selina Kyle
effect:
Whenever Catwoman causes breakthrough to an opponent, you draw a card and that opponent discards a card from his hand.
“This is just a momentary bout of conscience. It will pass soon.”

name: Charaxes, Drury Walker
effect:
Charaxes causes no breakthrough. Whenever Charaxes stuns an exhausted defender, KO that defender.
"You’re food now, fleshbag! "

name: Circle Defense
effect: As an additional cost to play Circle Defense, exhaust any number of non-defending Teen Titans characters you control. Target defender gets +3 DEF this attack for each character you exhausted.

name: Clench Virus
effect: Play Clench Virus only if you control a League of Assassins character. Ongoing: At the start of your attack step, put a plague counter on target character. When a character has plague counters greater than its cost, KO that character.

name: Clock Tower
effect:
Exhaust a support row Gotham Knights character you control -> Look at the top card of your deck. You may put that card on the bottom of your deck. Activate -> KO a face-down resource you control. Put the top card of your deck face down into your resource row.
A lonely place from which to watch the world.

name: Combat Reflexes
effect: Move target character you control to your front or support row. That character gets +3 ATK while attacking this turn.

name: Commissioner Gordon, James Gordon
effect:
Army Gotham Knights characters you control get +1 ATK and +1 DEF. Pay 3 endurance -> KO target equipment an opponent controls.
Once tasked to capture Batman, Gordon has forged a valuable friendship with the Caped Crusader.

name: Concrete Jungle
effect:
Each of your opponents turns all locations he controls face down. Ongoing: Whenever an opponent flips a location, that opponent discards a card from his hand.
“Nature always reclaims what is hers.”

name: Connor Kent as Superboy, Tactile Telekinetic
effect:
Exhaust a Teen Titans character you control -> Connor Kent gets +2 DEF this turn. Pay 2 endurance -> KO target equipment an opponent controls.
"Tactile telekinesis, ladies, that’s what Superboy is all about! "

name: Cracking the Vault
effect:
Play Cracking the Vault only during the combat phase. Exhaust a ready Arkham Inmates character you control. If you do, target player reveals his hand and discards each card with the same name as a card that player controls.
The clear perfection of ice. Even steel cannot resist it.”

name: Crossbow
effect: Transferable. Equipped character gets +1 ATK and has range.

name: Dawn Granger as Dove, Agent of Order
effect: While you control Hank Hall, Dawn Granger gets +1 ATK and +1 DEF. Boost 2: When Dawn Granger comes into play, if you don't control Hank Hall, search your deck for a card named Hank Hall and put it into your front row. Shuffle your deck.

name: Deathstroke the Terminator, Slade Wilson
effect:
Recruit Deathstroke the Terminator only if you control two or more characters without a team affiliation. Characters you control that do not have a team affiliation have the Deathstroke team affiliation.
“This is nothing personal. Your death is merely business.”

name: Dick Grayson as Nightwing, Defender of Blüdhaven
effect:
Whenever Dick Grayson stuns a character, draw a card. Discard a Gotham Knights character card from your hand -> Target defender has reinforcement this attack.
Nightwing protects crime-riddled Blüdhaven, located just outside Gotham City.

name: Dick Grayson as Nightwing, High Flying Acrobat
effect:
Whenever Dick Grayson stuns a defender, you may stun target character with the same cost as that defender. Boost 1: When Dick Grayson comes into play, if you control another Gotham Knights character, stun target army character.
In becoming Nightwing, Dick stepped out of the shadow of the bat.

name: Dick Grayson as Nightwing, Titan's Leader
effect:
While Dick Grayson is ready, Teen Titans attackers you control get +2 ATK. Boost 2: When Dick Grayson comes into play, Teen Titans characters you control get +2 ATK while attacking this turn.
The Titans aren't just a team, we're family.”

name: Dick Grayson as Robin, Side Kick
effect:
Activate, discard a Gotham Knights character card from your hand -> If target defender protecting Dick Grayson would become stunned this attack, instead exhaust it and move it to the support row.
Like Bruce Wayne, Dick Grayson was orphaned by crime. Like Batman, he battles against it.

name: Dinah Laurel Lance as Black Canary, Canary Cry
effect:
Activate -> Exhaust target unprotected character. Use this power only during your attack step.
A vicious martial artist, Dinah Lance also possesses the Canary Cry, a hypersonic scream.

name: Donna Troy as Wonder Girl, Amazon Warrior
effect:
As an additional cost to recruit Donna Troy, reveal another Teen Titans character card from your hand. Whenever Donna Troy becomes stunned, return Donna Troy to owner's hand.
"You’re not going anywhere until the Titans are through with you! "

name: Dr. Light, Arthur Light
effect:
Activate -> Stun target character with a cost less than the number of Fearsome Five characters you control. Boost 3: When Dr. Light comes into play, put all Fearsome Five character cards in your KO'd pile into your front row.
Bent on destroying the Teen Titans, Dr. Light is the nefarious leader of the Fearsome Five.

name: Dr. Tzin-Tzin, Master of Hypnosis
effect:
Activate -> Ready target attacker an opponent controls. That character gets -3 ATK this turn.
“You weak-minded fool! You are no match for my hypnotism!”

name: Dual Nature
effect:
As an additional cost to play Dual Nature, put a stunned League of Assassins character you control into your KO'd Pile. Choose a League of Assassins character card in your hand with a cost less than the cost of the character you put into your KO'd pile. Put the chosen card into your support row.
From death comes life. This is the way of the Demon’s Head.”

name: Dynamic Duo
effect: Gotham Knights characters cannot be stunned while team attacking this turn. Ongoing: Exhaust two Gotham Knights characters you control -> Turn Dynamic Duo face down.

name: Escrima Sticks
effect:
Transferable. Equipped character gets +1 ATK and +1 DEF.
Sticks and stones may break your bones. Sticks for sure.

name: Fast Getaway
effect:
As an additional cost to play Fast Getaway, discard a card from your hand. Target attacker causes no breakthrough while attacking a character this turn
“Hey, Bats! Quit tailgating!”

name: Fear and Confusion
effect:
While attacking this turn, characters you control get +1 ATK. Whenever an Arkham Inmates character you control attacks a character this turn, exhaust that character.
“Let your nightmares come out and play.”

name: Ferak, Army
effect:
Ferak comes into play exhausted. Whenever Ferak becomes stunned, you may put Ferak into your KO’d pile. If you do, you may put a card named Ferak from your hand into your support row exhausted.

Activate -> Search your deck for a card named Ferak, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.

“Burn it! Burn it all down! Bring in the lovely fire!”

name: Fizzle

“You can’t blame a clown for trying.”

name: Flying Fortress
effect:

name: From the Shadows
effect:
Target attacker gets +5 DEF this attack.
Beware the Shadows…

name: Garth as Tempest, Atlantean Socerer
effect:
Loyalty. Pay 3 endurance -> Return target card from your KO’d pile to your hand. Use this power only once per turn.

name: Gizmo, Mikron O'Jeneus

I only trust what I can build, 'cause I always build 'em to kill.”

effect:
Ongoing: Whenever a character is put into your KO'd pile from play, gain 2 endurance.
June 26. 10:47 P.M.

name: Gothcorp
effect:

name: Harley Quinn, Dr. Harleen Quinzel

name: Harvey Bullock, GCPD Detective
effect:

effect: Ongoing: Each of your opponents may not flip a location on the same turn it was placed into his resource row. Each of your opponents may not play a plot twist on the same turn it was placed into his resource row.

name: Huntress, Helena Rosa Bertinelli

Helena Bertinelli lost her family to mob warfare and became Huntress in a quest for revenge.

name: Jinx, Elemental Soceress

effect:

name: Lady Vic, Lady Elaine Marsh-Morton
effect:
Whenever Lady Vic stuns a character, KO that character unless its controller pays 3 endurance.
“I always complete my contracts. I have a family tradition to uphold.”

name: Last Laugh
effect:
Target player loses 1 endurance for each stunned character you control.
“Laugh and the world laughs with you.”

name: Lazarus Pit

It can extend your life indefinitely, but the cost is madness upon awakening.

name: Liberty Island Base
effect:

“The government just gave us this base to keep a better eye on us.”

name: Lightning, Travis Williams
effect:
Activate -> Target player loses 2 endurance for each exhausted character he controls.
…The roar of Thunder, the crash of Lightning.

name: Lockup, Lyle Bolton

name: Lucius Fox, Wayne Enterprizes Executive
effect: As an additional cost to recruit Lucius Fox, reveal another Gotham Knights character card from your hand. Activate, return Lucius Fox to owner's hand -> Gain 1 resource point. Spend this resource point only to recruit equipment cards. Use this power only during your recruit step.

name: Mad Hatter, Jervish Tetch
effect:
As an additional cost to recruit Mad Hatter, reveal another Arkham Inmates character card from your hand. Pay 1 resource point -> Move target character with a cost of 2 or less to your front row. At the start of the recovery phase, move that character to its owner's front row. Use this power only once per turn.
“Twinkle, twinkle, little bat, how I wonder what you’re at!”

name: Malaq, Money Man
effect:
Whenever you flip a location, Malaq gets +2 ATK this turn.
“Your business performance this year will not please my master. He does not suffer displeasure well.”

name: Mammoth, Baran Flinders
effect: As an additional cost to recruit Mammoth, reveal another Fearsome Five character card from your hand. When Mammoth comes into play, KO a resource you control. name: Man Bat, Dr. Robert Langstrom
effect:

"Skreeeeee! "

name: Matt Hagan as Clayface, Man of Clay
effect:
Whenever Matt Hagen attacks or is attacked, he gets +2 ATK and +2 DEF this attack for each exhausted character target opponent controls

name: Mega-Blast
effect: Target support row character has range this turn. While attacking this turn, that character gets +4 ATK.

name: Mirage, Miriam Delgado
effect:
When Mirage comes into play, you may reveal a Teen Titans character card from your hand. If you do, choose a team affiliation. Mirage has the chosen team affiliation. (This is in addition to the Teen Titans team affiliation.)

name: Mountain Stronghold
effect:
Mountain Stronghold is not unique. When Mountain Stronghold is flipped face up, search your deck for a League of Assassins character card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. name: Mr. Freeze, Dr. Victor Fries
effect:

name: Mr. Zsasz, Victor Zsasz

name: Museum Heist

name: Neutron, Nat Tyron

A latecomer to the Fearsome Five, Neutron is made up of pure nuclear energy.”

name: Pantha, Subject X-24

name: Paralyzing Kiss

name: Psimon, Dr. Simon Jones

effect:

name: Ra's al Ghul, Master Swordsman
effect:
Loyalty. When Ra's al Ghul comes into play, KO any number of resources you control. For each resource KO'd this way, put the top card of your deck face down into your resource row.
“Patience is the tool of the weak. The strong act when they choose.”

name: Ra's al Ghul, The Demon's Head
effect:
Loyalty. Your locations are not unique. Characters without the League of Assassins team affiliation have no team affiliation and cannot use payment powers.
“On its own, humanity is a destructive force. It needs a master.”

name: Ratcatcher, Otis Flannegan
effect:
Whenever a character becomes stunned, each of your opponents loses 1 endurance.
“My writhing, hungry horde will gnaw the meat from your bones!”

name: Raven, Daughter of Trigon
effect:
Loyalty. Pay 1 endurance --> Characters and locations target player controls cannot ready this turn. Use this power only during the recovery phase.
Azarath Metrion Zinthos!”

name: Red Star, Leonid Kovar
effect: Whenever Red Star becomes powered-up, he cannot be stunned while attacking this turn. Pay 1 resource point -> Target player loses 5 endurance. Use this power only once per turn and only if you control another Teen Titans character.

name: Remake the World
effect: As an additional cost to play Remake the World, exhaust a League of Assassins character you control. KO any number of locations you control. Move that number of locations target opponent controls to your resource row. For each location you moved this way, that opponent puts the top card of his deck face down into his resource row.

name: Riddle Me This
effect:
Play Riddle Me This only during your attack step. Exhaust a ready Arkham Inmates character you control. If you do, target player reveals two cards from his hand. Choose one of the revealed cards. That player discards that card.
What has yellow skin and writes?

name: Rigged Elections
effect:
Ongoing: Exhaust an Arkham Inmates character you control -> Put a ballot counter on Rigged Elections. If there are 25 or more ballot counters on Rigged Elections, you win the game.
“I would like to thank the voters, who have made their choice clear.”

name: Roy Harper as Arsenel, Sharpshooter
effect:
Exhaust a Teen Titans character you control -> Roy Harper gets +2 ATK this turn. Activate, KO a resource you control -> Stun target character with ATK less than Roy Harper’s ATK.
Master of all projectile weapons, Arsenal is deadly at any range.

name: Scarecrow, Professor Jonathan Crane
effect:
Whenever Scarecrow stuns an attacker, return that character to owner's hand. Whenever Scarecrow becomes stunned by a defender, return Scarecrow to owner's hand. Boost X: When Scarecrow comes into play, return all characters with a cost of X or less your opponents control to owners' hands. For each character returned to hand this way, put two +1 ATK/+ 1 DEF counters on Scarecrow.
"BOO!"

name: Shape Change
effect: Put the top card of your deck into your KO'd pile. Target defender you control gets -X ATK and +X DEF, where X is the cost of the card put into your KO'd pile this way.

name: Shimmer, Selinda Flinders
effect:
Activate -> Target player exhausts X ready characters he controls, where X is the number of Fearsome Five characters you control. Use this power only during your attack step.
"Bow down before the Fearsome Five!"

name: Spoiler, Stephanie Brown
effect:
Whenever you draw a card, you may gain 1 endurance.
Daughter of the villain Cluemaster, Stephanie Brown adopted the guise of Spoiler to thwart her father.

name: Superman, Big Blue Boy Scout
effect:
Recruit Superman only if you control Batman. While Superman is ready, he cannot be stunned.
"In this world, there is right and there is wrong, and that distinction is not difficult to make."

name: T-Jet
effect: Unique. Transferable. Characters you control have flight. Whenever a Teen Titans character you control becomes powered-up, that character gets +1 ATK and +1 DEF this attack. (This is in addition to all other power-up modifiers.)

name: Tag Team
effect: Target defender with reinforcement gets +2 ATK and +2 DEF this attack.

name: Talia, Daughter of the Demon's Head
effect:
Activate -> Reveal the top two cards of your deck. Put all revealed location cards into your hand. Put all other revealed cards on the bottom of your deck in any order. If you put at least one location card into your hand this way, discard a card from your hand.
“I am my father's daughter, not his minion.”

name: Tamaran
effect:
Activate, send the top card of your deck to the KO'd pile. Target Teen Titans attacker or defender is powered up
My planet was once green and beautiful. Now it is gone, though its people survive.”

name: Teen Titans Go!
effect: Ready all Teen Titans characters that have team attacked this turn. Those characters cause no breakthrough this turn.

name: Terra, Tara Marko
effect:
Loyalty. Activate -> KO a location you control. If you do, place the top card of your deck into your resource row and stun target character with a cost of 3 or less.
“Quit complainin' and let me get to crushin'.”

name: The Brave and the Bold
effect: Play only if you control a Gotham Knights character and a Teen Titans character. Draw a card. Ongoing: Characters you control, as well as cards in your hand, deck, and KO'd pile that have either the Gotham Knights or Teen Titans team affiliations have both affiliations.

name: The Demon, Etrigan
effect: When the Demon, Etrigan, comes into play, Endurance eight opponents must pay, To ignore this should a player choose, All his resources shall he lose.

name: The Demon, Jason Blood
effect:
Whenever the Demon becomes stunned, search your deck for a different version of a card named the Demon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck. Pay 1 endurance -> Reveal a face-down resource you control. If it is a non-ongoing plot twist, turn it face up and draw a card. Use this power only once per turn.
"Gone, gone, the form of man! Arise the Demon - Etrigan!"

name: The Joker, Joker's Wild
effect:
Loyalty. If you would mulligan and the Joker is in your hand, you may reveal the Joker instead. If you do, put your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order, and draw five cards. You may not mulligan. Boost 2: When the Joker comes into play, discard your hand and draw five cards.
“Card games, Dr. Ruth? You know me, I just adore card games.”

name: The Joker, Laughing Lunatic
effect:
Whenever the Joker is attacked, target opponent chooses a card from your hand at random. Reveal that card. If you revealed an Arkham Inmates character card, that opponent loses endurance equal to that card's cost.
“All it takes is one bad day to reduce the sanest man alive to lunacy.”

name: The Joker, The Clown Prince of Crime
effect:
Loyalty. Discard an Arkham Inmates character card from your hand -> Stun target character if its cost is equal to the card you discarded. Use this power only once per turn and only during your attack step.
“HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!”

name: The Penguin, Oswald Chesterfield Cobblepot
effect:
Pay 2 endurance -> Ready target location. Use this power only once per turn and only if you control another Arkham Inmates character. Discard a location card from your hand -> The Penguin gets +2 ATK and +2 DEF this attack.
He’s made a fortune with the less-than-legal schemes and businesses under his corporate umbrella.

name: The Riddler, Edward Nygma
effect: Activate, discard an Arkham Inmates character card from your hand -> Target opponent chooses and discards a card from his hand. If the cost of that opponent's discarded card is not equal to the cost of the card you discarded, that opponent discards an additional card. Use this power only during the recovery phase.

name: The Shrike
effect:
Unique. Transferable. Equip only to a League of Assassins character. Equipped character gets +X ATK, where X is the number of locations you control.
"From the seas, we hold regency over the land."

name: The Underworld Star
effect:
As an additional cost to play The Underworld Star, discard a Fearsome Five character card from your hand. Search your deck for a Fearsome Five character card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.
“The pay’s lousy… but the hours are good.”

name: Thuggee, Army
effect:
Whenever Thuggee attacks, target player loses 1 endurance.
We give our lives for the Demon's Head!”

name: Thunder, Gan Williams
effect:
Whenever Thunder stuns a defender, exhaust all other characters in the same row as that defender.
Brothers that strike in a manner frightening…

name: Tim Drake as Robin, The Boy Wonder
effect:
Activate -> Target Gotham Knights attacker gets +X ATK this attack, where X is the cost of that attacker.
The only Robin to seek the mantle, Tim Drake did so by deducing Batman's secret identity.

name: Tim Drake as Robin, Young Detective
effect:
If a team attacker you control would become stunned, you may stun another team attacker you control instead. Boost 2: When Tim Drake comes into play, Teen Titans characters you control cannot be stunned while attacking this turn.
We’re going to have a talk about teamwork, first.”

name: Titans Tower
effect:
Activate, discard a Teen Titans character card from your hand -> Target Teen Titans attacker or defender gets +X ATK this attack, where X is the cost of the card you discarded.
Both a state-of-the-art training center and stylish crash-pad, the latest Titans Tower is the cool hangout for today's young heroes.

name: Total Anarchy
effect:
Ongoing: Whenever a character with a cost of 3 or less becomes stunned, KO that character.
“It's a hot time in the old town tonight!”

name: Tower of Babel
effect:
Play Tower of Babel only if you control a League of Assassins character. During each player's attack step this turn, that player's characters that do not have the League of Assassins team affiliation have no team affiliation.
DYO RTNSBD

name: Trigon, The Terrible
effect:
At the start of the combat phase, move all locations in play to your resource row. Trigon gets +X ATK and +X DEF, where X is the number of locations you control.
“This world and everything in it is mine. From birth all will serve me.”

name: Twin Firearms
effect:
While in the front row, equipped character gets +4 ATK. While in the support row, equipped character gets +2 ATK and has range.
“No, seriously. Additional firepower is never, ever a bad idea.”

name: Two-Face, Harvey Dent
effect:
Activate -> Flip a coin. If you win the flip, KO target stunned character.
“If the unmarked face comes up, he goes free.” (regular version)

name: Ubu, Ra's al Ghul's Bodyguard
effect:
Loyalty. Characters protected by Ubu cannot be attacked
“You shall not disrespect my master!”

name: USS Argus
effect: If you would draw a card during the draw phase, skip that draw instead. Activate -> Look at the top four cards of your deck. Put one of them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Use this power only during the build phase and only if you control a Teen Titans character.

name: Utility Belt
effect:
Equip only to a Gotham Knights character. Equipped character can attack as though it had flight and range and has "Activate -> Negate target payment power effect."
“What don't you have in there?”

name: Ventriloquist as Scarface, Arnold Wesker
effect:
Card Text: While in the front row, Ventriloquist gets +2 ATK. Activate -> Front row Arkham Inmates characters get +1 ATK while attacking this turn. Use this power only if Ventriloquist is in the support row.
"Don't listen to the dummy; listen to me! Youse lousy rats!"

name: Vic Stone as Cyborg, Human Machine
effect:
Boost X: When Vic Stone comes into play, search your deck for an equipment card with a cost of X or less and equip it to Vic Stone. Shuffle your deck.
Cybernetics saved his life, but the Teen Titans gave it meaning.

name: Wayne Enterprises
effect: Flip Wayne Enterprises only if you control a Gotham Knights character. At the start of your formation step, you may transfer target equipment you control to an unequipped character you control. Activate -> Target equipped Gotham Knights character gets +1 ATK and +1 DEF this attack."

name: Wayne Manor
effect:
Exhaust a Gotham Knights character you control -> Gain 1 endurance.
Stately Wayne Manor is an architectural triumph, Bruce Wayne’s ancestral home, and the location of the Batcave.

name: Wheel of Plagues
effect:
Unique. Equip only to a League of Assassins character. At the start of the recovery phase, each player who controls one or more characters with a plague counter discards a card from his hand. Equipped character has “ Activate, pay 5 endurance -> Put a plague counter on target character.
"Disease, pestilence and death lie locked within its form. And I control it."

name: Whisper A'Daire, Cold-blooded Manipulator
effect: Whenever Whisper A'Daire causes breakthrough to an opponent, that opponent chooses a card from his hand and puts it on top of his deck. If you control seven or more resources, that opponent puts all cards in his hand on the top of his deck in any order instead.

name: Wildebeest, Army
effect: Wildebeest can team attack with characters named Wildebeest. Activate -> Gain 1 resource point. Spend this resource point only to recruit character cards named Wildebeest. Use this power only during your recruit step.

name: World's Finest
effect: Choose two different team affiliations among characters you control. Ongoing: Characters you control, as well as cards in your hand, deck, and KO'd pile that have either of the chosen affiliations have both affiliations.
